data.DescriptionHtml:
You imbue a robe, priestly garment, or outfit of regular clothing with divine power.
The spell bestows the following effects for its duration:

  • +1 sacred bonus to AC per five caster levels (maximum +4 at 20th level)
  • Damage reduction 5/evil Only a good-aligned creature gains the benefits of this spell.

Creatures of nongood alignment can wear the glorious raiment, but gain no spell benefits from doing so.
data.Name: Glorious Raiment
